definitions.text: a flat (usually rectangular) container for a letter, thin package, etc.
a curve that is tangent to each of a family of curves
a natural covering (as by a fluid)
examples: the spacecraft detected an envelope of gas around the comet

definitions.text: the maximum operating capability of a system (especially an aircraft)
examples: test pilots try to push the envelope

definitions.text: the bag containing the gas in a balloon
